hit-me-up:
Hey there! Want to send me a message? Well just fill out this handy dandy form and I'll get back to you ASAP. Go on! I don't bite! I've never bitten anyone that didn't deserve it! ðŸ‘ŒðŸ‘Œ

If you just want to know a little bit more about me, check out the [/about](https://www.leander.xyz/about) page, where I list off a few of my ðŸ”¥ picks and answer a few FAQs (which I wrote myself, so they're like fake FAQs but it's cool).

On the off chance you're impressed by all this and want to know more about me career-wise, check out the [/resume](https://www.leander.xyz/resume) page. I think it's pretty neat, and you can pretty much get the TL;DR of my life, along with a PDF version for you to file away under _'if we get desperate'_.

Looking forward to hearing from you!
